EventElementLabel: Do you want to suspend case deletion?
EventHintText: By default, a closed case will be deleted after 365 days. As this case if flagged for a live appeal/speak to REJ, the case can be retained if there is still action pending.

EventElementLabel: Do you want to suspend case deletion?
EventHintText: By default, a closed case will be deleted after 365 days. As this case if flagged for a live appeal/speak to REJ, the case can be retained if there is still action pending

EventElementLabel: Do you want to suspend case deletion?
EventHintText: By default, a closed case will be deleted after 365 days. If you want to retain the case, select 'Yes'. If you want to delete the case, select 'No'.
